about_the_game:
THE PLOT:

Sergei spent his childhood in the city of Pripyat, where he lived with his father and his kid sister, Varya. In 86, just a bit before the Chernobyl Disaster, kids began to go missing in the city. And one day Varya vanished as well. Tragically, the militsiya and the volunteer search parties were unable to find any leads.

On April 26th, 1986, disaster struck the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant, and afterward, no one had the time to search for the missing children. His father was one of the operators and died from radiation poisoning. Sergei was evacuated from the city, and he moved to live with his grandparents in Belarus.

After ten years, Sergei receives a strange envelope, which contains a photo of his sister standing in front of the dead city. How is this possible? Can she be alive?

To get answers to these questions, our hero must return to the abandoned city of Pripyat and piece together the horrifying truth of what happened to the missing children in 86.

FEATURES OF THE GAME:

  • You’ll be able to explore different locations within the city of Pripyat;

  • Immerse yourself in the times of the USSR;

  • The story will reveal to you the horrific fate of the missing children;

  • Solve the mystery of this mystical place and the restless souls that now inhabit it.

  • The map of the city will help you find the hiding places of artifacts from the times of the USSR;

  • Moderately difficult puzzles will entertain you throughout the course of the game;

  • A terrifying atmosphere and horrifying screamers;

  • A gorgeous visual style accompanied by atmospheric music and sound effects;

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes that may cause feelings of fear. Blood, dead people.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 3GB or similar

Recommended:
